tool.name: Train SNAP
tool.command: cp '${maker_gff}' input.gff3 && echo "\##FASTA" >> input.gff3 && cat '${genome}' >> input.gff3 && maker2zff input.gff3 && fathom -categorize ${gene_num} genome.ann genome.dna && fathom -export ${gene_num} -plus uni.ann uni.dna && forge export.ann export.dna && hmm-assembler.pl snap_training . > '${output}'

param.name: maker_gff
param.label: Maker annotation to use for training

param.name: gene_num
param.label: Number of gene model to use for training

tool.help: This tool allows to train SNAP (an ab-initio gene predictor) based on a previous prediction made with Maker.
